purpose: Highlight the disparity and challenges faced by Black women in the workplace.
title: An unequal workplace for Black women

bullets.text: More likely to say they do not have equal opportunity for advancement and to feel uncomfortable sharing their experience of grief or loss
More likely to not feel comfortable bringing their whole self to work
More likely to say they do not have strong allies on their team
more likely than women overall to report the death of a loved one was a big challenge
